Package greenmirror.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Visualizer.PlaybackState
    An abstract state class in accordance with the state design pattern.
    VisualizerMemento.Caretaker
    The caretaker role from the memento design pattern.
    VisualizerMemento.Originator
    The originator role of the memento design pattern.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTransition<E extends javafx.scene.Node,T>
    A Transition extension that holds features used by all subclasses.
    DoublePropertyTransition<E extends javafx.scene.Node>
    A more concrete extension of AbstractTransition.
    ServerController
    The main server class.
    Visualizer
    The main visualizer class and JavaFX application.
    VisualizerMemento
    A class to store a system state of the visualizer.

    The toolbar buttons.
